text: In search of lessons to  use  apply  determine  explain  apply  in our own careers, we often try to  magnify  memorize  emulate  pursue  emulate  what effective leaders do.  Roger Martin says this focus is misplaced, because  moves  innovations  documents  modifiers  moves  that work in one context may  cause  have  put  make  make  little sense in another. A more productive, though more difficult,  approach  behavior  endeavor  task  approach  is to look at how such leaders think.
